page.title: 01Review of Area
page.content: This area lies to the S.E. of Gloucester.Several major roads dissect the region,the A417,the A38 and a small section of the M5 motorway.The A38 and A417 form part of the city ring road.Bordering this are many industrial firms,including the extensive{Birds Eye Walls Ice Cream {Factory}as well as the{Fire and {Ambulance Stations}and the new computerised{GPO.Sorting Offices.}The {CEGB.}occupies a large site just off the Barnwood by-pass.East of this area is the village of Hucclecote with its own large industrial estate.Within the region lie a number of post-war housing estates.The most densely populated parts lie west of the area, nearest to the city centre.This area also includes many late 19th and early 20th century buildings.Farmland lies to the south and east of the region.
